channel.title: Exile Pk
channel.description:
Welcome guys to my new project, Exile Pk (not sure if I will keep this name). As you may or may not know, my other project Neitiznot was cancelled due to Jerba regarding IRL problems. Anyway, I wanted to create a new pking server. Although I said a pking server, [i]it won't just revolve around pking[/i]; there will be minigames, bosses and monsters. I went for this perspective as spawning servers last about a day, and get extremely boring. I have enough money to buy a Virtual Private Server, so I can assure you this will be released to the public.
[size=12pt]Features:[/size]
[ul][li]JAGGRAB - file server, on demand, service, net, dispatch. [/li] [li]Fully working tool tips w/ right clicking map region.[/li] [li]Added a screenshot button: which takes screenshots of the JFrame and sends to the cache.[/li] [li]Switching has been perfected.[/li] [li]Trivia bot has been implemented - which gives pk points and items.[/li] [li][b]Automatic server double pk point weekend.[/b][/li] [li]Summoning has been fully implemented - following, BoB storing, specials, dismiss, call. Furthermore, the server sends the client information regarding the summoning orb.[/li] [li]Soaking has been fully implemented.[/li] [li]XP counter has been implemented.[/li] [li]Barbarian defence minigame.[/li] [li]Fully NPC clipping has been implemented.[/li][/ul]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/17/8uuf.png/][IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/8012/8uuf.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/543/yei.png/][IMG]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/7812/yei.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/855/aj5.png/][IMG]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/1774/aj5.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/593/x7c.png/][IMG]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/5556/x7c.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/33/zi0k.png/][IMG]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/9331/zi0k.png[/img][/URL]
-famous m8

item.title: Exile Pk
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:14, topic:523078”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=641594.msg4322997#msg4322997 date=1372446757]

wtf lol, 508objects with 317 maps, looks odd.

the amount of blood runes.

illuminati

now if you could fix the characters to a lower revision, that would be great, though not sure what it’d do to some of the newer items o.O
[/quote]

Bauk has no soul

im pretty sure it would love up a bunch of items[/quote]

thank you Nick for that lovely comment.

updates:

[ul][li]New loading context menu’s.[/li]
[li]RSA encryption has been enabled on both client & server.[/li]
[li]Netty was implemented, but there was problems regarding the RSA encrypting packet sizes… so it’s pending.[/li]
[li]The server has moved towards a more of an event-driven server, fank tuck.[/li]
[li]Finished the activity point store.[/li]
[li]NPC clipping has been fully implemented.[/li][/ul]

See the advertisement thread to play BETA!

Read full topic

item.title: Exile Pk
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

Thanks for the support and motivation guys!

I’ve implemented an activity point system (doesn’t use process). Basically, it adds one point per character profile (on login) every hour. It also has saving and loading. There will also be a shop for these points to be used, it will be called the Activity Point Store. I’m still not sure what to put in it yet.

TLDR; the longer you stay on, the more points you get, you can buy better/good/unique items from the activity point store.

Now you may think: “:hurrrr: this is gonna wreck economy”. Not really, here’s how items will be based on time length:

[size=10pt]Example: [/size]

party hat = 100 points -> 1 point per hour -> 1 x 100 = 100 -> 100 / 24 = 4.16

Therefore, it would take a player around 4 days to get a party hat, that’s if they stayed on 24 hours for the 4 days. Assuming they wouldn’t stay on for the full 24 hours for 4 days, it would roughly take them 8-15 days.

[size=12pt]That’s just an example.[/size]

Hopefully this idea will bring in new players, staying with us, and being a lot more active.

Picture:
Coming soon.

Read full topic

Anyway, I wanted to create a new pking server. Although I said a pking server, it won’t just revolve around pking; there will be minigames, bosses and monsters.
